00026 int tmcl_move_to_pos_abs(TMCLMotor *motor, int position) {
00027 
00028     TMCLCommand comm;
00029 
00030     DEBUG("Moving motor to pos %d\n", position);
00031 
00032     comm.command = TMCL_MVP;
00033     comm.type = TMCL_MVP_ABS;
00034     comm.value = position;
00035 
00036     return tmcl_send_command(motor, comm, NULL);
00037 }
00038

00045     comm.command = TMCL_ROR;

00047 
00048     return tmcl_send_command(motor, comm, NULL);
00049 }

00100 /* Start reference search */
00101 int tmcl_refsearch_start(TMCLMotor *motor) {
00102 
00103     TMCLCommand comm;
00104 
00105     if (motor->device.num_refswitches < 1)
00106         return -1;
00107 
00108     DEBUG("Starting refsearch\n");
00109 
00110     comm.command = TMCL_RFS;
00111     comm.type = TMCL_RFS_START;
00112 
00113     return tmcl_send_command(motor, comm, NULL);
00114 
00115 }
00116 
00117 /* Stop reference search */
00118 int tmcl_refsearch_stop(TMCLMotor *motor) {
00119 
00120     TMCLCommand comm;
00121 
00122     DEBUG("Stopping refsearch\n");
00123 
00124     comm.command = TMCL_RFS;
00125     comm.type = TMCL_RFS_STOP;
00126 
00127     return tmcl_send_command(motor, comm, NULL);
00128 
00129 }
00130 
00131 /* Check if reference search is active
00132  * 
00133  * Returns : 0 when not active
00134  *                       1 when active
00135  *                      -1 on error
00136  */
00137 int tmcl_refsearch_status(TMCLMotor *motor) {
00138 
00139     TMCLCommand comm;
00140     TMCLReply reply;
00141     int retval = 0;
00142 
00143     DEBUG("Checking refsearch status\n");
00144 
00145     comm.command = TMCL_RFS;
00146     comm.type = TMCL_RFS_STATUS;
00147 
00148     retval = tmcl_send_command(motor, comm, &reply);
00149 
00150     if (retval < 0)
00151         return retval;
00152 
00153     if (reply.value == 0) /* No reference search running */
00154         return 0;
00155     else
00156         /* Reference search running */
00157         return 1;
00158 
00159 }
00160 
00161 /* Get current position of motor.
00162  * 
00163  * Returns: Current position of motor
00164  *                      0xFFFFFF on failure
00165  */
00166 int32_t tmcl_get_position(TMCLMotor *motor) {
00167 
00168     DEBUG("Getting current position from motor\n");
00169 
00170     if (tmcl_update_axis_parameter(motor, TMCL_AP_CURR_POS) < 0) {
00171         DEBUG("getting position failed");
00172         /* Returning -1 is not very sensible, becaue -1 is a valid position.
00173          * Because valid positions only range from -2^23...+2^23 we return
00174          * 0xFFFFFF on error */
00175         return 0xFFFFFF;
00176     }
00177 
00178     return motor->device.parameter[TMCL_AP_CURR_POS];
00179 }
00180 
00181 static int tmcl_percent_to_currentval(TMCLMotor *motor, unsigned int current_perc) {
00182 
00183         int current_par;
00184 
00185         if( (current_perc < 0) || (current_perc > 100)) {
00186         return -1;
00187         }
00188 
00189         switch (motor->device.model) {
00190         case TMCM300:
00191         case TMCM303:
00192         case TMCM310:
00193         case TMCM110:
00194         case TMCM610:
00195         case TMCM611:
00196         case TMCM612:
00197                 /* On these model current parameter is given in range from 0..1500 */
00198                 current_par = 1500 * current_perc / 100;
00199                 break;
00200         default:
00201                 current_par = 255 * current_perc / 100; /* convert % to value between 0 and 255 */
00202         }
00203 
00204         return current_par;
00205 
00206 }
00207 
00208 /* convert current value to percent */
00209 static int tmcl_currentval_to_percent(TMCLMotor *motor, unsigned int value) {
00210 
00211     int current_perc;
00212 
00213     switch (motor->device.model) {
00214         case TMCM300:
00215         case TMCM303:
00216         case TMCM310:
00217         case TMCM110:
00218         case TMCM610:
00219         case TMCM611:
00220         case TMCM612:
00221                 /* On these model current parameter is given in range from 0..1500 */
00222                 current_perc = value / 1500 * 100;
00223                 break;
00224         default:
00225                 current_perc = value / 255 * 100;
00226         }
00227 
00228     return current_perc;
00229 }
00230 
00231 int tmcl_set_max_current(TMCLMotor *motor, unsigned int current) {
00232 
00233     int current_par;
00234     int ret;
00235 
00236     DEBUG("Setting maximum current, current = %d\n", current);
00237 
00238     current_par = tmcl_percent_to_currentval(motor, current);
00239 
00240     if (current_par < 0)
00241         return current_par;
00242     else {
00243                 ret = tmcl_set_axis_parameter(motor, TMCL_AP_ABS_CURRENT, current_par);
00244                 return ret;
00245     }
00246 }
00247 
00248 int tmcl_get_max_current(TMCLMotor *motor) {
00249 
00250     int value;
00251 
00252     value = tmcl_get_axis_parameter(motor, TMCL_AP_ABS_CURRENT);
00253     return tmcl_currentval_to_percent(motor, value);
00254 
00255 }
00256 
00257 int tmcl_set_max_standby_current(TMCLMotor *motor, unsigned int current_percent) {
00258 
00259     int current_par;
00260     int ret;
00261     DEBUG("Setting maximum standby current\n");
00262 
00263     current_par = tmcl_percent_to_currentval(motor, current_percent);
00264         if (current_par < 0)
00265                 return current_par;
00266         else {
00267                 ret = tmcl_set_axis_parameter(motor, TMCL_AP_STBY_CURRENT, current_par);
00268                 return ret;
00269         }
00270 }
00271 
00272 int tmcl_get_max_standby_current(TMCLMotor *motor) {
00273 
00274     int value;
00275 
00276     value = tmcl_get_axis_parameter(motor, TMCL_AP_STBY_CURRENT);
00277     return tmcl_currentval_to_percent(motor, value);
00278 
00279 }

00281 int tmcl_set_microsteps(TMCLMotor *motor, int microsteps) {
00282 
00283     int microstep_par;
00284 
00285     DEBUG("Setting %d microsteps\n", microsteps);
00286 
00287     if (motor->device.model == TMCM100) /* Unsupported on this device */
00288         return -1;
00289 
00290     switch (microsteps) {
00291     case 0: /* Full steps */
00292         microstep_par = 0;
00293         break;
00294     case 2: /* Half steps */
00295         microstep_par = 1;
00296         break;
00297     case 4:
00298         microstep_par = 2;
00299         break;
00300     case 8:
00301         microstep_par = 3;
00302         break;
00303     case 16:
00304         microstep_par = 4;
00305         break;
00306     case 32:
00307         microstep_par = 5;
00308         break;
00309     case 64:
00310         microstep_par = 6;
00311         break;
00312     default: /* Unsupported micro-steps */
00313         return -1;
00314     }
00315 
00316     return tmcl_set_axis_parameter(motor, TMCL_AP_MICROSTEPS, microstep_par);
00317 }
00318 
00319 /* Returns number of microsteps on success, else -1 */
00320 int tmcl_get_microsteps(TMCLMotor *motor) {
00321 
00322     int value;
00323 
00324     if (motor->device.model == TMCM100) /* Unsupported on this device */
00325         return -1;
00326 
00327     value = tmcl_get_axis_parameter(motor, TMCL_AP_MICROSTEPS);
00328 
00329     switch (value) {
00330     case 0: /* Full steps */
00331         return 0;
00332         break;
00333     case 1: /* Half steps */
00334         return 1;
00335         break;
00336     case 2:
00337         return 4;
00338         break;
00339     case 3:
00340         return 8;
00341         break;
00342     case 4:
00343         return 16;
00344         break;
00345     case 5:
00346         return 32;
00347         break;
00348     case 6:
00349         return 64;
00350         break;
00351     default: /* Error */
00352         return -1;
00353     }
00354 }
00355 
00356 /* Set limit switch number "limit_switch" to active (value = 1) or inactive (value = 0) */
00357 static int tmcl_set_limit_switch(TMCLMotor *motor, int limit_switch, int value) {
00358 
00359     int parameter;
00360 
00361     if ((value > 1) || (value < 0))
00362         return -1;
00363 
00364     switch (limit_switch) {
00365     case 0:
00366         parameter = TMCL_AP_DISABLE_LIMIT_L; /* Left switch is reference switch */
00367         break;
00368     case 1:
00369         parameter = TMCL_AP_DISABLE_LIMIT_R;
00370         break;
00371     default:
00372         return -1;
00373     }
00374 
00375     value = 1 - value; /* Inverting set/disable logic */
00376 
00377     return tmcl_set_axis_parameter(motor, parameter, value);
00378 }
00379 
00380 /* Check if limit switch is activated.
00381  *
00382  * return 1 if switch is active and 0 when inactive
00383  */
00384 int tmcl_get_limit_switch(TMCLMotor *motor, int limit_switch) {
00385 
00386     int value;
00387     int parameter;
00388 
00389     switch (limit_switch) {
00390     case 0:
00391         parameter = TMCL_AP_DISABLE_LIMIT_L; /* Left switch is reference switch */
00392         break;
00393     case 1:
00394         parameter = TMCL_AP_DISABLE_LIMIT_R;
00395         break;
00396     default:
00397         return -1;
00398     }
00399     value = tmcl_get_axis_parameter(motor, parameter);
00400     /* Value is 1 if switch is disabled and 0 if not, so we invert the logic here */
00401 
00402     if (value >= 0) { /* value < 0 is error */
00403         value = 1 - value;
00404     }
00405 
00406     return value;
00407 
00408 }
00409 
00410 int tmcl_activate_limit_switch(TMCLMotor *motor, int limit_switch) {
00411 
00412     return tmcl_set_limit_switch(motor, limit_switch, 1);
00413 }
00414 
00415 int tmcl_deactivate_limit_switch(TMCLMotor *motor, int limit_switch) {
00416 
00417     return tmcl_set_limit_switch(motor, limit_switch, 0);
00418 }

00420 int tmcl_set_no_ref_switch(TMCLMotor *motor, int number) {
00421 
00422     int retval;
00423

00445             motor->device.num_refswitches);
00446 
00447     if (retval >= 0)
00448                 motor->device.num_refswitches = number;
00449 
00450     return retval;

00452 
00453 int tmcl_set_refsearch_speed(TMCLMotor *motor, int fraction) {
00454 
00455     /*
00456      For the reference search this value specifies the search
00457      speed as a fraction of the maximum velocity:
00458      0 – full speed
00459      1 – half of the maximum speed
00460      2 – a quarter of the maximum speed
00461      3 – 1/8 of the maximum speed (etc.)
00462 
00463      Valid values for 'fraction': 0..8
00464      */
00465 
00466     int retval;
00467 
00468     if (fraction < 0 || fraction > 8)
00469         return -1;
00470 
00471     retval = tmcl_set_axis_parameter(motor, TMCL_AP_RFS_SPEED, (int) fraction);
00472 
00473     return retval;
00474 
00475 }
00476 
00477 int tmcl_get_refsearch_speed(TMCLMotor *motor) {
00478 
00479     return tmcl_get_axis_parameter(motor, TMCL_AP_RFS_SPEED);
00480 }

00483 
00484     return tmcl_get_axis_parameter(motor, TMCL_AP_CURR_SPEED);
00485 }

00488 int tmcl_set_pos_speed(TMCLMotor *motor, int speed) {
00489 
00490     int retval;
00491 
00492     retval = tmcl_set_axis_parameter(motor, TMCL_AP_MAX_POS_SPEED, speed);
00493 
00494     return retval;
00495 
00496 }

00502 
00503 /* Get status of limit switch 0: left, 1: right */
00504 int tmcl_get_limit_status(TMCLMotor *motor, int limit_switch) {
00505 
00506     int parameter;
00507 
00508     switch (limit_switch) {
00509     case 0:
00510         parameter = TMCL_AP_LIMIT_L; /* Get left limit switch status */
00511         break;
00512     case 1:
00513         parameter = TMCL_AP_LIMIT_R; /* Get right limit switch status */
00514         break;
00515     default:
00516         return -1;
00517     }
00518 
00519     return tmcl_get_axis_parameter(motor, parameter);
00520 }
